General.Name: Tego Cyber Inc
General.Description: Tego Cyber Inc. provides cyberthreat intelligence and associated services for larger business enterprises. The company offers Tego Guardian, a proactive intelligent cyberthreat hunting tool that gives enterprises the ability to track threats throughout their networks, mapping out exposures, and expediting remediation. Its services include cyber threat intelligence reporting, which provides individuals or enterprises with custom cyber threat intelligence on issues such as social media impersonation, compromised email credentials, look-a-like domains, social media trends, and possible DarkWeb presence. The company is also developing the Tego threat intelligence platform. Tego Cyber Inc. was incorporated in 2019 and is headquartered in Las Vegas, Nevada.
General.Address: 8565 South Eastern Avenue, Las Vegas, NV, United States, 89123
